title: fingerprint recognition device
extract: Definition of: fingerprint reader. fingerprint reader. A scanner used to identify a person's fingerprint for security purposes. After a sample is taken, access to a computer or other system is granted if the fingerprint matches the stored sample.
extract_html: Definition of: fingerprint reader. fingerprint reader. A scanner used to identify a person's fingerprint for security purposes. After a sample is taken, access to a computer or other system is granted if the fingerprint matches the stored sample.
